makemp3.description: Generates an MP3 file and returns its URL.

attributes.path: File path under WorkSpace site path.
attributes.js_caption: Generate a JavaScript file to display subtitles that sync with the audio.

furiganajsonurl.description: When 'Generate JSON for Furigana is set in URL Mapping, a JSON URL will be output. When previewing, the preview admin URL will be output. When dynamic publishing, RESTful API EndPoint will be output.

attributes.mode: For dynamic publishing only, Specify '1' to add furigana, Specify '2' to add furigana and break with clauses and Specify '3' to only break with clauses.
attributes.api: Output API endpoint instead of statically output file's URL.

modifier_furigana.attribute: Specify '1' to add furigana, Specify '2' to add furigana and break with clauses and Specify '3' to only break with clauses.

modifier_hiragana.description: Converts kanji and katakana to hiragana.

modifier_katakana.description: Converts kanji and hiragana to katakana.

modifier_ssml2furigana.description: Convert the phoneme element to the ruby element, convert the katakana of the rt element and ph attributes to hiragana, and delete '.

modifier_textnode_furigana_to_json.description: Returns text nodes in HTML and converted text in key-value format JSON.
modifier_textnode_furigana_to_json.attribute: Specify '1' to add furigana, Specify '2' to add furigana and break with clauses and Specify '3' to only break with clauses.
